original_text: Over the olive and sycamore trees in the Shephelah was Baal-hanan the Gederite; and over the stores of oil was Joash.
korean_text: 게델 사람 바알하난은 평야의 감람나무와 뽕나무를 맡았고 요아스는 기름 곳간을 맡았고

sentences.original_text: Over the olive and sycamore trees in the Shephelah
sentences.korean_translation: 세펠라 지방의 올리브나무와 뽕나무를 맡은 사람은

sentences.original_text: and over the stores of oil
